original_text: As they emptied their sacks, behold, every man's bundle of money was in his sack. And when they and their father saw their bundles of money, they were afraid.
korean_text: 각기 자루를 쏟고 본즉 각 사람의 돈뭉치가 그 자루 속에 있는지라 그들과 그들의 아버지가 돈뭉치를 보고 다 두려워하더니

sentences.original_text: every man's bundle of money was in his sack
sentences.korean_translation: 각 사람의 돈다발이 그의 자루 안에 있었다

sentences.original_text: And when they and their father saw their bundles of money
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 그들의 아버지가 돈다발들을 보았을 때
